name: Biocbrazil2014
tagline: Code and vignettes in support of the SummerX Bioconductor course in Brazil
body:
## Overview

Code and vignettes in support of the SummerX Bioconductor course in Brazil

### Installation

In R:

```
source('http://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R')
biocLite('BiocBrazil2014',siteRepos='http://watson.nci.nih.gov/~sdavis/software/R',
   type='source')
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
